name: Responsive Vertical Icon Menu
author: wpdevart

sections.description:
WordPress Responsive Vertical Icon Menu plugin is an nice and handy plugin for showing your menus in widget. It’s very simple to use. There are a lot of style and font settings that you will like.

View our plugin demo page:

  • Demo Page

You can check some of our plugin features below.

Features of Free version

  • Easy install and use
  • Works without problem with all WordPress versions
  • Fully Responsive
  • Ability to add Icons
  • Ability to choose Submenu opening type and set the duration
  • Ability to choose icon function when clicking on it
  • User friendly back-end
  • Tested on popular WordPress themes

You can upgrade the free version to Vertical menu Pro to add some great features.

The features of Pro version

  • Ability to change Main, Sub and Active menus styles
  • Ability to select Font family
  • Ability to set border styles
  • Ability to set Background color

If you have any type of question occuring our plugin contact us at support@wpdevart.com.

Step by step guide

General Settings

  • Submenu opening type – Select when to display the submenu
  • Submenu opening duration – Type the submenu opening duration
  • Icon option when clicking on it – Choose the option when clicking on it

Main(Parent) menu style options

  • Padding – Type the padding parameters
  • Icon size – Type the size
  • Background color – Select the Background color
  • Font size – Type the Font size
  • Font family – Choose the Font family
  • Font style – Select the Font style
  • Text color – Choose the Text color
  • Background color when hovering – Choose the Background color when hovering
  • Font size when hovering – Type the Font size when hovering
  • Font family when hovering – Select the Font family when hovering
  • Font style when hovering – Select the Font style when hovering
  • Text color when hovering – Choose the Text color when hovering
  • Active Background color – Select the Background
  • Active Font size – Type the Font size
  • Active Font family – Select the Font family
  • Active Font style – Select the Font style
  • Active Text color – Select the Text color
  • Border width – Type the Border width
  • Border color – Select the Border color
  • Border color when hovering – Select the Border color when hovering
  • Active Border color – Select the Border color
  • Submenu icons size – Type the icons size
  • Submenu opening icon padding – Type the opening icon padding
  • Submenu closing icon padding – Type the closing icon padding

Submenu style options

  • Padding – Type the padding parameters
  • Background color – Select the Background color
  • Font size – Type the Font size
  • Font family – Choose the Font family
  • Font style – Select the Font style
  • Text color – Choose the Text color
  • Background color when hovering – Choose the Background color when hovering
  • Font size when hovering – Type the Font size when hovering
  • Font family when hovering – Select the Font family when hovering
  • Font style when hovering – Select the Font style when hovering
  • Text color when hovering – Choose the Text color when hovering
  • Active Background color – Select the Background color
  • Active Font size – Type the Font size
  • Active Font family – Select the Font family
  • Active Font style – Select the Font style
  • Active Text color – Select the Text color
  • Border width – Type the Border width
  • Border color – Select the Border color
  • Border color when hovering – Select the Border color when hovering
  • Active Border color – Select the Border color
sections.installation:
First of all download the plugin ZIP file.

  1. Log in to your WordPress admin panel.
  2. Go to your Plugins page, then click Add New > Upload Plugin .
  3. Click “Choose file” then select the plugin zip file.
  4. After that upload and activate our plugin.

sections.reviews:
Great plugin

By prowl00 on February 13, 2022

Works very well and the support is very good! Highly recommend.

The best service

By fr10co on April 14, 2021

fix my problems instantly...

Great Support

By MaxFolmer on March 6, 2020

There was a small problem with the arrows in the Wpdevart vertical menu. But they solved it quickly and gave me the .css solution to fix it on my production website. Thanks people!

So far so good, keep it up guys!

By cdegeus on February 19, 2020

Nifty little plugin that is working great with Divi.

Nice plugin

By tinkz on February 5, 2020

Does exactly what I needed. Great support team too. Needed a font added to the existing suite of fonts. The Team turned it around in a couple of days. Excellent!

Awesome Support

By graphiti on January 22, 2019

Your customer support is just amazing! The plugin works perfect, with all the look and feel as well the functions I needed. But it did not load the google fonts I was using. Just one e-mail to the support team and they solved it! Hope the plugin will be updated more with the fonts and other capabilities, but till then your support was the best! Keep it up!

Nice vertical menu

By wpdevart on January 30, 2018

Hi. We think this is an nice solution for widget menu, you can also add menu icons. Thanks
